dmca.title: None
dmca.body:
I am writing to inform you that an order was granted on the twenty ninth of April, 2003 in the Los Angeles Citizens court under European Union law, Protection of Internet Property Statute no. 4356 and under United States Federal legislation, 
 The Corporate Privacy Information Act passed in the United States Senate on the fifteenth of April 2001. This authorises us to 
 monitor and track computer activity which we believe are contravening the aforementioned statutes. I have to make you aware 
 that for the past fourteen days your internet activity has been monitored resulting in information becoming available to us that 
 you have illegally accessed several Internet paysites unlawfully. A full list of these sites is available and should you choose we 
 can forward them to your Email address. Photoshots have been taken of your computer hard drive and will be used as 
 corroborative evidence should legal proceedings be commenced. As of today the sixteenth of July, 2003 you have fourteen 
 days in which to recompence the sites to which you gained unlawful entry. This can be done by purchasing a full membership 
 to aforementioned sites, however should you choose not to make full and equitable recompence legal proceeds will be brought 
 against you. 
    
                                                            Yours 
                                                    J. Stephen Hawkins. 
                                                       Attorney at Law.
